html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02532024-03-25ISED
ActPatent Act
SubjectRules Amending the Patent Rules
PrecisRules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to grant the Commissioner the authority to (1) extend the period of time for the payment of fees when the Commissioner provided erroneous information in writing concerning these fees; (2) waive the unpaid portion of a fee that was the subject of an insufficient payment; and (3) put in place transitory measures, for a period of time after waiving fees for applicants and patentees that paid a fee at an incorrect amount.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0050 Publication Date: 2024-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Rules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to grant the Commissioner the authority to (1) extend the period of time for the payment of fees when the Commissioner provided erroneous information in writing concerning these fees; (2) waive the unpaid portion of a fee that was the subject of an insufficient payment; and (3) put in place transitory measures, for a period of time after waiving fees for applicants and patentees that paid a fee at an incorrect amount.
